alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 7:42PM CDT until April 17 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR LINCOLN...LAWRENCE...EASTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHEASTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 742 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wesson to Enterprise to 8 miles southwest of Smithdale, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Enterprise, East Lincoln and Ruth around 750 PM CDT. Topeka, Sontag and Oma around 755 PM CDT. Monticello, Wanilla, Jayess and Robinwood around 800 PM CDT. Tilton, Oak Vale and Arm around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include New Hebron, Silver Creek, Beauregard and Meadville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
